entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Test failures on NodeJS/Linux because RemoteExecutor is not supported #64776
  • [wasm] V8/Linux `RuntimeError: memory access out of bounds` for `System.Text.Json.Tests` #64775
  • [wasm] V8/linux - assertion `src/mono/mono/metadata/class-accessors.c:92` in `System.Linq.Tests` #64774
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'fldSeqForStaticVar->GetTail() == zeroOffsetFldSeq' during 'Do value numbering' #64773
  • [wasm] sgen assertion with in `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #64769
  • Under Linux, System.IO.Ports.SerialPort leaks memory when timeout occurs #64768
  • Improve how byte arrays are created in ZipHelper.GetEncodedTruncatedBytesFromString #64767
  • profiler.multiple failing on MacOS 12.0 #64765
  • Assertion failed 'fgReachable(begBlk, endBlk)' during 'Update flow graph opt pass' #64764
  • system.globalization.tests.icutests.icushouldbeloaded #64763
  • normal-system.text.json.sourcegeneration.roslyn3.11.unit.tests work item #64762
  • Assertion failed 'a != b' during 'Do value numbering' #64761
  • .NET 6 API does not start up in a AKS, and produces no logs #64760
  • Enable packages for Mariner 2.0 #64756
    7.0.0
  • Linux Arm64 RPM packages #64755
    7.0.0
  • Linux Process.StartTime seems to use a different timebase than System.DataTime.Now and others #64742
  • FileStream's BufferedFileStreamStrategy lacks GC.SuppressFinalize(this) call causing it eligible for Finalization Queue #64741
  • Validator.TryValidateObject does not handle Record Type validation #64736
  • IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties().GlobalProperties.GetActiveTcpConnections() causes memory leak #64735
  • Adding direct support for graphics please. #64732
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_StringBuilder #64751
  • [wasm] NodeJS samples failing at exit with emsdk `2.0.34` #64727
  • [wasm][aot][windows] Crash in `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Tests` #64725
  • [wasm][aot][windows] Crash in `Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Tests` with emsdk `2.0.34` #64724
    7.0.0
  • Native crash in `System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests` #64719

Closed

  • Add ReadMe to NuGet packages #64342
  • Test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256/Vector256_ro/Vector256_ro.sh Timed Out #60154
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithEmbeddedPdb` timing out on CI #62667
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.BreakpointInAssemblyUsingTypeFromAnotherAssembly_BothDynamicallyLoaded` timing out #62823
  • KnownHeader values may change casing of received values #64053
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: String Default Constructor #64714
  • [API Proposal]: Add Today to DateOnly and Now to TimeOnly #64757
  • TimeOnly is not read from appsettings #64739
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile using keyword parameters with @ prefixes #60968
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator with TreatWarningsAsErrors Fails #64499
  • Linq count is slower than linq where count #64728
  • Make working with JSON and HTTP Requests easier #64676
  • Ping.Send buffer is not really sent on linux running as non-root #62458
    Future
  • [Android] Test failure: System.IO.Tests.Enumeration.RootTests.CanRecurseFromRoot #55822
    7.0.0
  • RyuJIT: String.Empty vs "" #42694
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonValue is almost unusable #64472
  • Difference in attribute handling by System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Validator.TryValidateObject between .net core 3.1 and .net 6 #64672
  • ContentRootPath and appsettings.json behavior differences between worker and console app #64698
  • [wasm] `BreakpointTests.CreateGoodBreakpointAndHitGoToWasmPageWithoutAssetsComeBackAndHitAgain` failing #64585
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestAllWithReload` failing on CI #62666
  • [API Proposal]: Adding overloading FileStream.FlushAsync(bool flushToDisk) #64485
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix issue in r2rdump where conflicting generic instantiations can cause the r2rdump process to fail #64772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Inline System.Boolean Parse helper methods #64771
    community-contribution
  • Remove spin lock from SocketAsyncEventArgs on Windows #64770
    area-System.Net.Sockets, tenet-performance
  • [wasm] Some cleanup of wasm jobs in runtime-extra-platforms #64766
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Disable failing tests #64759
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix outerloop AcceptAsync_WithTooSmallReceiveBuffer_Failure test #64758
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [release/6.0] vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64754
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add ActivitySource support to DiagnosticsHandler #64753
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [NO MERGE] SHM_NAME_MAX #64752
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.IO
  • Fix card marking issue #64748
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Consolidate _handshakeBuffer and _internalBuffer in SslStream #64747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Run debugger test in codespace #64746
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • #51017 enable tests for android #64743
  • Change the way we build CoreCLR tests for NativeAOT #64738
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] pass ExitStatus when calling quit_ #64734
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Enable set of nullability checks in NativeAOT CoreLib #64730
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Process.GetProcessById bugfix #64723
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Avoid stress log shutdown race condition #64722
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update helix queues #64721
  • Initial roll out of !! #64720
    area-Meta
  • Add default method support to virtual statics #64717
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #64711
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Consume renamed TargetFramework package #64670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mitigate #60154 #63357
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some racy tests #64712
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Deduplicate class names under JIT/Methodical/cctor #64710
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use ordinal comparison for known header values #64702
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Deduplicate single-assembly vs. multi-assembly stringintern tests #64709
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move explicit coverage entry points into separate public classes #64708
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Clean up remaining tests under JIT/Methodical using Environment.Exit #64706
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • Bump up visibility for several helper types under JIT/Methodical #64716
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 2.0.34 bump #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Pass IV through cipher resets for OpenSSL and Android #64641
    area-System.Security
  • Disable some library tests on ARMv6 architecture due to failures #64733
    area-Meta
  • Update Maui Workload Install Process for Perf #64692
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-maui] Bump emsdk version - packs to 6.0.1 #64713
  • Workaround permission issue on Android API30 emulators when pulling test results #64744
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Prefer "mov reg, wzr" over "mov reg, #0" #64740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Logging Source Generator - Adds support to `@` signed prefixed parameters #64663
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • fixup more helix pools #64718
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Throw PNSE if insufficient privileges when custom Ping payload was specified #64625
    area-System.Net
  • #55822 Disable CanRecurseFrom root for Android #64682
    area-System.IO
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test build command in docs/workflow/building/coreclr/nativeaot.md #64690
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Check for multicast delegate before comparing invocation lists #64729
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `--jitpath` parameter to ILC #64731
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable WasmTemplateTests on CI #64589
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve metadata generation resiliency #64715
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix racy page reload test #64695
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #64644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Improve perf of Enumerable.Sum/Average/Max/Min for arrays and lists #64624
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • make sure failed SSL does not impact other sessions #64256
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fixes bad log method generation in certain cases. #64704
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64705
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Take into account zero-offset field sequences when propagating locals #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip AOT of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.dll for WASM, due to out-of-memory issues in CI #63958
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Allow missing assemblies in llvmonly+interp mode. #64294
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    Servicing-approved, area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Fix WebSocket tests on NodeJS #64330
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64687
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload make Linq Expressions code to fail with cached (static) reflection #23736
  • Moving or renaming files in pre-build event causes errors while publishing project in net6.0 #23732

Closed

  • [Package Validation] Integrate the new option of single Left and multiple rights into package validation #17369
    7.0.1xx
  • [Compatibility] Move NoWarn error suppression to suppression engine #18486
    7.0.1xx
  • [Package-Validation] Add support for not reporting errors for tfms which are out of support. #18583
  • [Package Validation]: Deprecating old .NET versions causes validation failure #21424
  • Crossgen2 nuget package is not pulled when dotnet restore is done #18999
    Discussion
  • App has reference to PresentationFramework and System.Windows.Forms while it doesn't use them #23721

PullRequests

Created

  • Reverse versions in error message #23748
    Area-Workloads
  • Add property builder helper #23730
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Bump System.Net.Http from 4.3.0 to 4.3.4 in /src/Tests/Msbuild.Tests.Utilities #23725
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Bump System.Net.Http from 4.3.2 to 4.3.4 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/11TestAppWith10CLIToolReferences #23726
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Ensure properties are escaped with double quotes #23720
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in record-structs.md #5716
  • Update required members spec #5688

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VB: SyntaxFactory is unable to parse a DateTime literal #59260
  • Assertion in StackFrameParser #59258
  • `<exception>` tag does not limit available `cref` symbols to exceptions #59257
  • Missing quick refactor action to convert event add/remove into expression body #59255
  • Prompt for variable upon ctor snippet #59252
  • IntelliSense is not suggesting generate method option #59251
  • 'Implement Interface' quick actions using defined global using #59250
  • Fix the bug of escape code inside regex keep causing ide to crash #59249
  • IntelliSense would only show suggestions based on matching type, not random suggestions #59247
  • Specify interface when using "Extract interface" refactoring #59246
  • OutOfMemoryException thrown when compiling a project with a lot of source code on x86 #59240
    17.2
  • Introduce SyntaxAnnotation which matches leading indentation without otherwise moving trivia #59228

Closed

  • Visual Studio does not suggest changing the language version to preview when using generic attributes. #58742
    17.2
  • Raw string literal API review. #59046
    17.2
  • Delete FatalError.ReportIfNonFatalAndCatchUnlessCanceled #58375
    17.2
  • Calling a record struct constructor throws System.InvalidProgramException #59239
  • Crash on arm/arm64 with mono due to missing memory barriers #24932
    Compiler.Next
  • Async/await are not highlighted inside a razor file when clicked #59120
    17.2
  • Ctrl-comma swallows spaces when named valuetuples are displayed #59231
  • Add IDE support for StringSyntaxAttribute #59163
    17.2
  • BrowserHelper.GetHelpLink output is non-deterministic #39415
    Backlog
  • CancellationTokenSource disposed in AbstractExtensionMethodImportCompletionProvider.cs #58932

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix generate method in switch arms. #59261
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'populate switch' to understand more possible user cases #59259
    Area-IDE
  • Support block/expression body preferences for event accessors #59256
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer 'use not null' when inside an expression tree #59254
    Area-IDE
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly calling SyntaxTreeOptionsProvider.IsGenerated #59244
    Area-Compilers
  • Run 20 iterations each of potentially flaky tests #59243
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2" #59242
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Move workspace file removal to BG to avoid UI delay" #59241
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typos #59237
    Area-Compilers
  • Save and restore '_factory.Syntax' in LocalRewriter methods #59236
    Area-Compilers
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • fix restore on nuget 6.2.0.33 #59230
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Follow up on LDM decisions made 2022-01-26 #59229
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals

Merged

  • Removes Bing search link from diagnostic data #59212
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Always allow the 'upgrade project' fixer to upgrade to 'preview' versions of C# #59248
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update build pools for VS insertion and publish to BAR #59253
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add option in feature flags to control which UI is shown #59238
    Area-IDE
  • Move embedded language tests to unittests2 project #59235
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle param null check with else clause #59224
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add datetime completion tests #59234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix display of tuples in navto results #59232
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable keyword highlighting in LSP #59215
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Remove dependency on options from IDiagnosticService #59096
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add support for StringSyntaxAttribute with json/regex/datetime literals. #59225
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move FunctionIdOptions to EditorFeatures #59166
    Area-IDE, Next
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • [17.0] Report errors for structs with missing field initializers and implicit parameterless constructor #59055
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Validate Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.Package on net6.0 #59187
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Differences between health check execution (.NET 3.1 and 6.0) #39974
  • SignalR SourceGenerator attribute API #39973
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add general property bag to cookies to support potential new cookie "standards: #39968
  • FileMultipartSection.FileStream and MultipartSection.Body Nullability Differences #39966
  • Wrong RuntimeFrameworkVersion indicated in runtimeconfig #39962
  • Performance Degrade after upgrade to .NET6 #39961
  • MediaType.IsSubsetOf returns true for application/hal+json and application/json #39959
  • System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException: 'The payload was invalid. For more information go to http://aka.ms/dataprotectionwarning' #39958
  • Minimal APIs: Moving handler with single parameter of type `HttpContext` to separate method results in empty response #39956
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Kestrel will only bind to an IPEndPoint not an EndPoint #39955
  • Blazor IDisposable not working #39953
  • Cache IResult types for well known status codes and results without parameters #39951
  • Incorrect global:: for generic types #39950
    7.0-preview2

Closed

  • Consider an analyzer to warn if a [Parameter] property isn't a simple auto property #26230
    Backlog
  • Analyzer: Change expression-bodied property to action method #39698
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #39919
  • Diagnostics for EnableInsecureAbsoluteFormHostOverride #39756
    6.0.3
  • blazor cs1503 cannot convert from System.DateTime? to System.DateTime, but it works fine #39785
  • cachedFunction of JSInterop causes memory leaks #39918
  • Blazor-server sign in option. #39928
  • AuthenticationService.js 404 not found in Blazor Multi Application #39922
  • Authorization fails in Controllers after Login is successful #39688

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable SingleFileExe #39977
    area-mvc
  • Don't compare SequencePosition instances #39975
    area-runtime
  • [docs] Modernize steps in project template README #39949
    area-mvc
  • Enable CA2007 for all ns2.0 projects #39946
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update KnownRuntimePack as part of updating KnownFrameworkReference #39965
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Implement BL0007: Component parameters should be auto property #30102
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • MVC: Save an allocation in PageRequestDelegateFactory & ControllerRequestDelegateFactory #39942
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Always pack App projects for consistency #39952
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Fixed misleading CookieOptions.HttpOnly summary #39937
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Fire an event when allowing a bad request #39944
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.3
  • Also build `npm` projects in parallel #39945
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Add readonly to record struct #39755
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview2
  • Build targeting pack archives less #39948
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • [release/6.0] Make UseUrls() override default hosting config #39836
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.3

Updated

  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Write fields directive to streamwriter #39900
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr
  • Allowing empty FromBody parameters input based on nullability #39917
    breaking-change, area-mvc
  • Proposal for how we handle more metadata for auth #39892
    area-security
  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • Blazor Server - Auto reconnect on mobile browsers #32122
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Support Custom Classes for ValidationMessage #38639
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet-gcdump collect: System.Exception: Read past end of stream #2841

PullRequests

Updated

  • Adding Commandline args to dotnet-tool ps #2831
    .NET 7.0
  • Fix module base address calculation on lldb #2837

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build Error NETSDK1032 when changing Platform Target to x86 on Windows #4503
  • Blazor Hybrid WinForms apps give error if there's an ErrorBoundary #4502
  • [Mac][Windows] Desktop applications require easy programmatic access to the Mouse and Keyboard #4498
  • Refactor Essentials statics into interfaces/singletons #4497
  • Handler and MauiContext is null when View isn't #4496
  • EFCore SQLite in MAUI App not working on iOS #4490
  • .NET MAUI Blazor - additional template options #4488
    Blazor Backlog
  • Android Labels don't overflow #4487

Closed

  • Blazor MAUI: Controls in BlazorWebView use the device's culture and not an application configured culture #4484
  • IBorder was implemented incorrectly #3951
  • Blazor FileInput is not working on Android #4483
  • Project Template to use existing Blazor wasm hosted project as input for BlazorWebview #4486
  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4477

PullRequests

Created

  • Shell WinUI Handler #4501
  • [templates] add xml encoding directive #4495
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom Execution Strategy with Entity Framework Core #27368
  • Slow DB performance with SQLite using EF Core in UWP app #27365
  • Invalid translation of a Query with GroupBy #27364
  • Scaffold-DbContext runs successfully but does not create any query #27362
  • Filtering by enum values with CompareTo leads to SQL query translation error #27360
  • Scaffolding for Sqlite doesn't generate ValueGeneratedOnAdd() in model builder for autoincremented indices #27359
  • Add-Migration ignores IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementation and starts project instead after upgrading to EFCore 6 #27358
  • Collection_navigation_equal_to_null_for_subquery fails after merging from release/6.0 #27356
  • I can't connect the library to my Powershell script #27355
  • Support value-converted parameters in raw SQL #27354
  • [Question] SQL server query with update operation in EF core #27353

Closed

  • Default value "HasDefaultValueSql" not working as expected. #27346
  • FirstOrDefault after custom projection == null cannot be translated #18476
    6.0.3
  • Calling setter for ICollection of navigation properties #27329
  • Query: Rownumber conversion needs better logic to figure out partitions #26756
    6.0.3
  • Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27072
    6.0.x
  • EF core 6 selecting null values despite where clause asking for not null #26744
    6.0.3
  • ServiceProviderCache keeps initially created IServiceProvider indefinitely #27169
    6.0.3
  • dbscaffold creates reference error CS0120 in nameof() for InverseProperty in certain conditions #26588
    6.0.3
  • Removing entities which have optional foreign dependency using DbContext #27352

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove quirks #27357

Merged

  • Update azure-pipelines.yml for Azure Pipelines #27363
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27351
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Bump Humanizer.Core from 2.13.14 to 2.14.1 #27321
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Cosmos: Add IS_DEFINED() function to cosmos provider #27344
  • Issue 27301 - Optimizer hangs on properties implementing a referential collection #27350
